name: IPRULES 2002.01.01
description: IPRules scripts for version IPRULES 2002.01.01 have been loaded

name: Round Up
description: If set on, the Timesheet program will use the rounding up function.

name: AP Handle Partial Disbursement
description: Controls whether the program will not show any warning or errors (value=0), warn the user (value=1) or display an error (value=2) when the purchase being entered is only partially disbursed.

name: LETTERSAFTERDAYS
description: The number of days added to the system date to automatically generate the Letter date in the Policing Request program

name: CountryProfile
description: The Centura Country Profile constant for the presentation of Local Currency.  Leave blank if the same as the country of operation.

name: Ignore Case First Linked To
description: When set to True the Report Issued and Received dates will also be pushed through to associated Cases event if the Case First Linked To flag is set on for the Case.

name: Log Time as GMT
description: The log datetime stamp may use Greenwich Mean Time irrespective of location as an alternative to using the Log Time Offset site control.

name: CPA User Code
description: CPA System Id that is extracted into the output files

name: Auto Import Duplicate Files
description:
Determines how Import Server will process files that have already been imported when running in automatic mode.
1 - Add files to the queue with an error but do not process
2 - Re-add files to the queue and process
3 - Ignore files already processed.

name: CASEONLY_TIME
description: When set on then Timesheet entries with only a name are displayed in red and will prevent the timesheet from being posted
components: Case, IP Matter Management, Name, WorkBenches

name: Quotations
description: Controls whether Quotation data can be viewed and edited in the Time and Billing modules.  When set ON Quotation columns and picklists are visible.  When OFF they are invisible.

name: IPOfficeDivRel
description: The RelatedCase relationship used for exporting the Divisional Number to the IP Office

name: Rollover Log Files Directory
description: The full path, preferably in the UNC (Universal Naming Convention) format, of the directory where InPro will save Rollover log files.  The UNC path looks like this: \\server_name\directory_path.

name: IPRULES 2005.01RN
description: IPRules scripts for version IPRULES 2005.01RN have been loaded

name: Restrict On WIP
description: Controls use of bad debtor restrictions within Timesheet & WIP. When TRUE, the restrictions for bad debtors eg. require password, will be implemented within Timesheet & WIP. When FALSE, Timesheet & WIP give warnings if bad debtor restrictions exist.

name: CPA Use CaseId as Case Code
description:
Use the CASEID to report to CPA as the Case Code.  This will be required if any Case Reference (IRN) exceeds the 15 character maximum on the CPA database.
Warning - this option should not be changed once live data exchange has begun.

name: CPA PD 13
description: 1st Priority Date

name: CPA-CEF Event
description: EventNo mapped to the Event Date from the Composite Event File (CEF)

name: Case Event Default Sorting
description: Controls the default sorting of Events table on the Case Events tab. ES = Event Sequence. ED = Event Date. DD = Event Due Date. NR = Date Next Reminder. IL = Importance Level. CD = Cycle, Event/Due.

name: Additional Internal Staff
description: Allows specifying a Name Type of an additional Internal Staff.  When a valid Name Type is entered the Internal Staff data field pick list becomes visible on the Instructor tab in the Case program. Note: EMP, SIG, I and A cannot be used.

name: DocGen Row Display Limit
description: Defines the default value for the 'Row display limit' field in the Document Generator program.

name: Police Immediately
description: When it is set ON causes Policing to run immediately when an Action is opened or an event is updated.  When it is OFF then a request is written into the POLICING table for the POLICING SERVER to process.
components: EDE Module, IP Matter Management, Policing

name: Attach HTTP Response To Case
description: When set to TRUE the response received after delivering a document via Document Generator using the HTTP (Hyper Text Transfer Protocol) will be attached as a file to the case.

name: CPA TM 17
description: Previous Renewal Date

name: CRM Default Opportunity Status
description: The default Opportunity status to be assigned to a Opportunity when it is first created.  This is the code visible via Table Maintenance for the Opportunity Status table.  It can also be found on TableCodes.TableCode for TableType=145.

name: Client Number Types Shown
description: In WorkBenches, these are the number types for a case which can be shown to external users. Selected from the NUMBERTYPES.NUMBERTYPE column or a comma-separated list of these. If blank, only number types where ISSUEDBYIPOFFICE =1 will be displayed.

name: PROMPTCOUNTRY
description: In the Names program, if this is set on the operator is prompted to enter a country of a new name as it is being entered, so that the address for the name is formatted appropriately for that name.

name: DN Copy Text 1
description: The text to be placed in the asCopy field of the Debit Note for the first of the Firm's copies.

name: Client Name Types
description: In the Internet Enquiry module, this holds the names type relationships the client name must have to gain access to the case. Selected from the Nametype.Nametype column or combinations of these values separated by commas. (eg, "I,A").

name: IPRULES 2004.04NR
description: IPRules scripts for version IPRULES 2004.04NR have been loaded

name: Policing Reminders On Hold
description: When TRUE, the On Hold Date will be set to the future reminder date for any reminders generated with a future date.

name: DocMgmt Path
description: Specifies the full path to the Document Management program, i.e. the location of the program and the name of the executable.  The location has to be, preferably, in the UNC (Universal Naming Convention): \\server_name\path_to_executable.

name: Statements Sender Email
description: The email address from whom debtor statements will be sent. This will be the From address of the email to which the statement will be attached.

name: CPA EDT Email Body
description: The body of the EDT email to be sent to CPA. The symbol combination '$$$' signifies the batch number variable and will be replaced by the actual running batch number

name: Case Instr. Address Restricted
description: If set to TRUE, Instructor address will not be derived if the instructor has more than one address. If mandatory this will force the user to manually select one. If FALSE, Instr. Address will be defaulted/derived as normal.

name: Billing Credit Tolerance
description: The percentage tolerance used by billing to determine whether the remainder of a credit item (e.g. prepayment or unallocated cash) is trivial enough for it to be automatically paid out. Calculated as Remainder/Original Amount. Default is 3.00 (i.e. 3%)

name: Database Email Via Certificate
description: When set to TRUE, emails will be sent directly via database mail using a signed certificate.  FALSE, send email as background task.

name: Police Continuously
description: This flag causes Smart Policing to continue processing any unprocessed Policing requests. Setting the site control to FALSE will allow Smart Policing to complete the current cycle and exit gracefully.

name: Sell Rate Only for New WIP
description: If set on, the Sell Rate of the currency (rather than the Buy Rate) will always be used as the exchange rate when a WIP item is entered in a foreign currency.

name: Wizard Show Tabs
description: If this option is turned ON the tabs will be visible when entering details about a case via the Workflow Wizard.

name: CPA PD 27
description: Start Paying Date

name: Client Request Email Subject
description: The name of the doc item providing the subject line for the email produced when a new client request is created.

name: Police Immediate in Background
description: If set to TRUE then Policing Immediately will run as a background task. This will allow the user to continue to do other things within the Case program while Policing is in progress.
components: EDE Module, IP Matter Management, Policing

name: Telecom Type - Home Page
description: The Code of the Telecommunications Type that represents the web home page for a name.  This is the code visible via Table Maintenance for the Telecommunications Type.  It can also be found on TableCodes.TableCode for TableType=19.
components: Case, IP Matter Management, Name, WorkBenches

name: Client Request Case Summary
description: The name of the doc item providing the default information to be placed in the Summary field of a case-specific Client Request.

name: CPA-Use ClientCaseCode
description: If Inprotech user is known by CPA as a Managing Agent, then the IRN will be held in the CLIENTCASECODE instead of the AGENTCASECODE field.

name: FeeListNameType
description: The name type (code) to use in the Fees List program â€“ fees lists can be filtered and consolidated by the chosen name type.

name: CPA Date-Registratn
description: EventNo of the Registration date to be extracted for CPA

name: Maintain File Request History
description: If set to true, File Requests would not be deleted automatically when the file location is updated to requested location otherwise if the file location record is created, the corresponding file request gets deleted automatically.

name: CPA P 15
description: PCT filing

name: WIP Summary Currency Options
description: Controls the default setting of the Currency Options on the WIP Summary window. 1-Local; 2-Foreign; 4-Anticipated Agent. Sum together where appropriate. E.g. 3- Display Local & Foreign columns.

name: CPA EDT Email Copies
description: The email address to send copies of the CPA Interface EDT file to (e.g. the EDT manager). If you wish to send to multiple email addresses they should be separated by a semicolon ( ; )

name: Event Display Order
description: The order of the events displayed in the Summary forms D indicating descending order and A ascending: DA(default) - EVENTDATE(descending) and EVENTDUEDATE(ascending). DISPLAYSEQ - events sorted by the DISPLAYSEQUENCE and CYCLE.

name: Inflation Index Code
description: WIP Code used by Billing to carry the value of the Inflation Index when creating a Quotation Instalment Bill.

name: WIP NameType Default
description: In the Work In Progress report window there is the option to display the report in detail grouped by Name Type. The Name Type specified in this Site Control will appear as the default selection in the associated dropdown, e.g. EMP.

name: Show Past Reminders
description: TRUE will leave the From: date field in the Reminders program blank allowing the user to view all past reminders. FALSE will set the From: date field to the day after the last work day. Default is FALSE.

name: AP Default Supplier Tax Code
description: The default consumption tax code shown on invoices of the Supplier to be recorded on purchases. Leave blank if no defaulting required. Example: A tax code of T1 will imply that the Standard consumption tax will apply as a default to all purchases.

name: AR Without Journals
description: When turned on, any transaction posted within the Accounts Receivable module will not be passed to the Financial Interface for accounting.  When turned off, the rules for creating Journals in the financial interface apply.

name: Discount Renewal WIP Code
description: The WIP Code to be used on any Discount WIP Items created for renewal WIP.  This must be a WIP Code entered via the WIP Template pick list.

name: Document Attachments Disabled
description: When set to FALSE documents created from the Forms menu can be added as an attachment to the case or name (the default). When set to TRUE the Add as attachment checkbox is disabled.

name: Exchange Loss Reason
description: The code of the default Reason to be used if an Exchange Loss occurs.

name: Timesheet show Case Narrative
description: If set, Timesheet will display read-only Case Narrative in Case Summary panel and in Timer View

name: CASE_EVENTENTRY_HREF
description: A hyperlink that may be included in emailed reminders.  Takes the user to an appropriate CPA Inprostart page to update the event.  Modify the above to replace "www.MyOrg.com/CPAInprostart" with the details specific to your firm.

name: OfficeGetFromUser
description: If this site control is On then name aliases need to be set up for the Users so that the Staff Name of the currently logged in User can be determined and from there the office can be defaulted into the new Case or Name.

name: Prepayment Warn Bill
description: Controls whether a warning will be given if available prepayments (and other valid credits) are not taken up when drafting a manual bill.

name: Report Server URL
description: This site control specifies the web address of the Reporting Services instance. It is referenced when Report Services is called from Client Server.

name: CPA Received Event
description: The event updated for each case when data is imported from CPA and accepted

name: Fees List Format A
description: The name of the QRP file to use for Fee list that do not include the age of the case

name: B2B EPOLine Command Import
description: Specifies the full command line path plus executable and parameters for import. Substitution parameters will be used i.e. %filename%

name: Duplicate Organisation Check
description: If set ON, the Names module will perform a check when a new organisation is entered to determine if it may be a duplicate of an already existing name.
components: Case, IP Matter Management, Name, WorkBenches

name: Show extra addresses
description: Displays the Extra Addresses window in the Names program, and sets the flag on to do this from the Names Summary window.

name: Name Variant
description: When set to TRUE  the Name Variant tab is displayed in the Names program. When set to FALSE (the default) the tab is not displayed.

name: Numeric Stem Not Defaulted
description: Set to TRUE to instruct the Cases program not to default the Numeric Stem field on the Numeric Stem window to the previously entered value.

name: LASTIRN
description: The last IR number currently used for sequentially numbered IRs

name: Policing Message Interval
description: The time interval, in tenths of a second, that determines how often the policing status messages should be refreshed when policing is running.  0=Not display messages at all; 5 =0.5sec; 10=1sec; 30= 3secs;

name: USPTO Private PAIR Enabled
description: If set to true, indicates that case data comparison with US PTO Private PAIR has been configured for use at this site.  Users with appropriate permissions will be able to compare case data.

name: Duplicate Individual Check
description: If set to 1 or 2, the Names module will perform a check when a new individual is entered to determine if it may be a duplicate of an already existing name (2 = check restricted to office for non-clients, 1 = unrestricted).
components: Case, IP Matter Management, Name, WorkBenches

name: Case Export Office Suffix
description: The suffix to be concatenated with the Office user code for the first column of a Case Export MC export file. If no Office user code exists, an exception will be raised.

name: IPOfficePriorityRel
description: The RelatedCase relationship used for exporting the priority Convention details to the IP Office

name: BulkRenAbandonEvent
description: The default event to use for abandoning a case via Bulk Renewals.

name: Due Date Report Template
description: The report template to be used by the due date report. 2 are delivered as part of the standard installation: duedaterpt.qrp and duedateUS.qrp.

name: Bill Ref Doc Item 2
description: The name of the Doc Item that is executed for each case (the case IRN is used as the entry point for the doc item). The text returned by the Doc Item is passed to the Billing Report Template as the Input Item DetailRefDocItem2.

name: Docket Wizard Action
description: Default Open Action to be used in docket wizard demo.

name: Case Reference Procedure
description: User defined stored procedure name used to extend or replace the Case Reference generation rules.

name: CPA TM 28
description: Start Paying Date

name: Reciprocity Disb
description: A comma separated list of all the Disbursement WIP type Codes to be used in the calculation of the Disbursements Incurred statistic for Reciprocity; eg ASSFEE, OTHPD.  If not specified, all disbursement WIP Types will be used.
components: Case, IP Matter Management, Name, Reciprocity

name: Addr Change Reminder Template
description: The Alert Code of the Alert Template to use when generating an ad-hoc reminder to inform administrative staff that an address has changed on an invoice.

name: Show extra telecom
description: Displays the Extra Telecom. window in the Names program, and sets the flag on to do this from the Names Summary window.

name: Policing Rows To Get
description: The maximum number of rows on the Policing Server to be processed at the one time.  If zero then ALL available rows will be processed.

name: IPRULES 2004.02NR
description: IPRules scripts for version IPRULES 2004.02NR have been loaded

name: Policing Concurrency Control
description: This flag indicates that a Policing batch process (e.g. recalculate) is to generate a Policing request for each individual Case being processed.  This will then block any other Policing against the Case from being processed until completion of the batch.

name: IPRULES 2003.01.US-A
description: IPRules scripts for version IPRULES 2003.01.US-A have been loaded

name: EDE Transaction Processing
description: The number of transactions within an EDE batch to process in parallel. Used to reduced time locks held. 0 - entire batch processed; 1 - lowest number of transactions and shortest lock period. >1 to decrease locking but improve overall throughput.

name: Bill Ref-Multi 9
description: The name of the Item to be used for extracting billing reference for multi-case bills. This SQL is extracted for the first case only and suffixes any other details extracted.

name: EXTACCOUNTSFLAG
description: Set on if an external accounting system is in use and allows an Account number to be recorded against the Name on the Names program. If the flag is on then the field called *Accounts Code* appears in the Main names window

name: IPRULES 2003.03RN
description: IPRules scripts for version IPRULES 2003.03RN have been loaded

name: Email Debtor Statement To
description: The name of the Item to be used for extracting the To email address for Debtor Statement

name: CPA TM 19
description:
1st Priority No.
CPA Trade Mark layout item # 19

name: Policing Retry After Minutes
description: Number of minutes Policing will wait before attempting to reprocess a Policing request a second time. Zero indicates no second attempt to occur.

name: Stop Processing Event
description: EventNo set from standing instruction to stop processing these Cases. Used to indicate that client no longer is using the firm.
